column1:
function addCommas(nStr)
        {
        	nStr += '';
        	x = nStr.split('.');
        	x1 = x[0];
        	x2 = x.length > 1 ? '.' + x[1] : '';
        	var rgx = /(\d+)(\d{3})/;
        	while (rgx.test(x1)) {
        		x1 = x1.replace(rgx, '$1' + ',' + '$2');
        	}
        	return x1 + x2;
        }
